document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|1368}}, Glayde and his associates were the target of a scam by the [[bard]] [[Silke Rosena]]. She arranged to meet with them at the [[Red Sheaf]] inn under the pretense of purchasing some [[gem]]s. Silke then tried to have Glayde and his fellows attacked by some locals, pretending as if they were local thugs hired to collect from a poor defenseless bard.
